    • validatesyntax

      static void validatesyntax(int filecount, BufferedReader reader, UserDefinedMaps fileMap) throws IOException
      Validates syntax of CSV files.
      Parameters:
      filecount - The number of files to validate.
      reader - The BufferedReader object for reading input file names.
      fileMap - A map storing file names and associated PrintWriter objects.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • validatesyntax

      private static void validatesyntax(File file, UserDefinedMaps fileMap)
      Validates syntax of a specific CSV file.
      Parameters:
      file - The CSV file to validate.
      fileMap - A map storing file names and associated PrintWriter objects.

    • validatesyntax

      private static void validatesyntax(String[] fields) throws TooFewFieldsException, TooManyFieldsException, MissingFieldException, UnknownGenreException
      Validates the syntax of fields in a CSV line.
      Parameters:
      fields - An array containing the fields of a CSV line.
      Throws:
      TooFewFieldsException - If there are too few fields in the line.
      TooManyFieldsException - If there are too many fields in the line.
      MissingFieldException - If any field is missing in the line.
      UnknownGenreException - If the genre code is unknown.

    • validsemanticerrors

      static void validsemanticerrors(String[] field) throws BadIsbn10Exception, BadIsbn13Exception, BadPriceException, BadYearException
      Validates semantic errors in the fields of a CSV line.
      Parameters:
      field - An array containing the fields of a CSV line.
      Throws:
      BadIsbn10Exception - If the ISBN-10 is invalid.
      BadIsbn13Exception - If the ISBN-13 is invalid.
      BadPriceException - If the price is invalid.
      BadYearException - If the year is invalid.

    • validatefields

      public static void validatefields(String[] field) throws MissingFieldException, TooFewFieldsException, TooManyFieldsException
      Validates the number of fields, ensuring it's neither too few nor too many. Also checks for missing fields.
      Parameters:
      field - An array containing the fields of a CSV line.
      Throws:
      MissingFieldException - If any field is missing in the line.
      TooFewFieldsException - If there are too few fields in the line.
      TooManyFieldsException - If there are too many fields in the line.

    • validategenre

      public static void validategenre(String genreCode) throws UnknownGenreException
      Validates the genre code.
      Parameters:
      genreCode - The genre code to validate.
      Throws:
      UnknownGenreException - If the genre code is unknown.

    • validateprice

      public static void validateprice(Double pr) throws BadPriceException
      Validates the price, ensuring it's non-negative.
      Parameters:
      pr - The price to validate.
      Throws:
      BadPriceException - If the price is negative.

    • validateISBN

      static void validateISBN(String ISBN) throws BadIsbn10Exception, BadIsbn13Exception
      Validates the ISBN-10 or ISBN-13.
      Parameters:
      ISBN - The ISBN to validate.
      Throws:
      BadIsbn10Exception - If the ISBN-10 is invalid.
      BadIsbn13Exception - If the ISBN-13 is invalid.

    • validateyear

      public static void validateyear(int yr) throws BadYearException
      Validates the publication year.
      Parameters:
      yr - The year to validate.
      Throws:
      BadYearException - If the year is not within the valid range.

    • containsNonDigitChar

      public static boolean containsNonDigitChar(String str)
      Checks if a string contains non-digit characters.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to check.
      Returns:
      True if the string contains non-digit characters, otherwise false.

    • transfer

      static Book[] transfer(Book[] books, int totalBooks)
      Copies a portion of the book array to a new array.
      Parameters:
      books - The original array of books.
      totalBooks - The total number of books to copy.
      Returns:
      A new array containing the copied books.

      public static void logError(File errorFile, File file, String error, String line)
      Logs syntax errors to a file.
      Parameters:
      errorFile - The file to log errors to.
      file - The file being processed.
      error - The error message.
      line - The line where the error occurred.

      Initializes PrintWriter objects for writing to CSV files.

      Returns:

    • serializeBook

      static void serializeBook(String fileName, Book[] books)
      Serializes an array of Book objects to a binary file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the binary file to serialize to.
      books - The array of Book objects to serialize.

    • deserializebook

      public static Book[] deserializebook(String fileName)
      Deserializes an array of Book objects from a binary file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the binary file to deserialize from.
      Returns:
      An array of Book objects deserialized from the file.
